query: SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'candidates' ORDER BY ordinal_position
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'candidates' ORDER BY ordinal_position
